analysis.description: YoLoCoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/45/0x5f0efd4da1fa88504617b8cd3d4db487621cf761.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x5f0efd4da1fa88504617b8cd3d4db487621cf761.sol:
	Contract YoLoCoin has payable functions:
